title: I might be the minority, but I actually like playing LoL and don't think it's in such a bad state...
body:
I mean, there are certainly still aspects of the game that are super dumb (like Akali's shroud), but overall I enjoy playing and I feel like my personal performance has a good amount impact on whether I win or lose games.

I sympathize with many of the critical posts here on the boards, but I don't think the game is "broken" or "dying" or anything to those extremes.
